choices: Vicky is after the chickens again!
1.content:
The headlights of your car cut through the darkness of the cool night as you drive down a long dirt road, past countless miles of fields and wooden fence. Apparently, your Uncle Derrick must have been a hermit or something, because the farmhouse up ahead is the first house you’ve seen in at least an hour. You have no idea why he left it to you, or that he even owned a farm.

You also have no idea what you are going to do with it. You know nothing about farming, and you never even considered doing it for a living, because getting up at four in the morning and working your ass off until nightfall, no matter the weather conditions, just didn’t sound very appealing to you.

But you decided to check it out anyway. Which is why you flew all the way across the country to see the place. Maybe you could just sell the place and be done with it. As you pull into the long dirt driveway, the place looks like any other farm you’ve seen. Wide open fields, a barn, stable, etc. But there is no sign of any corn fields, or crops of any kind. Guess Uncle Derrick didn’t really do any farming either. But why would he own this place then?

You park directly in front of the farmhouse and get out of your car. You can’t really make out what the house looks like in the dark. As you walk up the steps and across the porch, you dig into your pocket for the house-key that had been included with the land deed for this place in your uncle’s will. You insert the key into the lock, but you have to jiggle it a little before the door opens.

From the moonlight streaming in through the windows, it looks like you’ve entered the kitchen. You can see a table in the center of the room and can make out the outline of cabinets and a stove on the walls. But you notice something strange. A dim light coming from the doorway into the living room. Odd, there shouldn’t be anyone here. You peek around the corner of the doorway, and see that the fireplace at the far end of the room is lit. Laying in front of the hearth, curled in a ball, is a strange black shape.

“What the hell?” You think to yourself. You cautiously make your way towards the black shape, almost tip-toeing. But as you are about two feet from the strange thing, you fell your foot tread on something, and in that instant, the black shape leaps up to it’s full height , giving off a yowl of pain.

The strange creature is almost eye level with you, maybe just a bit taller. It appears to be some sort of cat! Except, it’s standing on two legs, and seems to have a body similar to a human’s with cat like features! It is covered from head to toe in black fur, with glowing yellow eyes and a small hoop earring in it’s left ear. Claws as sharp as razors tip each of it’s fingers and toes. It appears to be female from it’s rather trim body and breasts that looked to be a C-cup.

You realize the thing you had stepped on was this creature’s tail, as you could see it leading from under your foot, all the way to her backside. Her tail was very long and flexible, and made this creature seem all the more strange.

What ever this thing was, she looked pissed. She yanks her tail out from under your foot and gets down on all fours, claws digging into the floor. She arches her back, the fur standing on end, and hisses at you angrily, showing her gleaming white fangs.

You step back, knowing that this cat-thing was about to maul your ass. Then you hear footsteps coming from upstairs, and a female voice. “Tara? What’s going on?” You see a light illuminate the staircase to your right and see a shadow coming down the stairs. When the figure reaches the bottom, you can’t believe your eyes. Standing there in another animal/human hybrid. This one was a dog, a husky to be exact. She had a white belly, breasts and face, the same for her hands and feet. The rest of her body was covered in black, except for the tip of her tail.


Her icy blue eyes light up upon seeing you, she charges towards you and practically tackles you to the ground. She sits on top of your stomach, stradling you. You close your eyes and wait for the chomp, thinking that these strange creatures are going to eat you.

But instead of teeth, you feel her tongue slide across you face again and again, her tail wagging excitedly. “I’m so glad you’re finally here!” Says the husky. You open your eyes to see her smiling down at you. “Um…….thanks?” You say. “Could you please get off of me?” The husky obediently does so, allowing you to get up. You steadily get back on your feet, eyeing the strange creatures in front of you. The cat stands there with her arms crossed, a look of contempt on her face, while the husky stars at you with a happy, excited look.

“Who are you?” you finally manage to ask. “Better yet, what are you?” “Oh, I’m sorry.” Says the husky. “I suppose an explanation is due. My name is Sasha, and this is Tara.” She nodded toward the cat, who only gave you a cold stare as a response. “As to what we are, as you can see, we are animals, but no completely so. I believe you humans commonly call us “furries” or “anthros”.”

You nodded slowly. “Can you tell me what you are doing in my uncle’s, well, actually my house?” Sasha walk over to a nearby sofa and motions for you to sit. You do so, and she lays down across your lap, belly up. “Didn’t you wonder why your uncle left you this farm?” she asks. “Yes, the entire way here.” You say.

“Well, we‘re the reason.” Says Sasha. “You see, your uncle took care of me and my friends for several years, but as his final days wore on, he told us of his nephew who volunteers at a local animal shelter and loves animals. He knew you would take good care of us.”

“Well,” You say. “It’s true I volunteer and care for animals, but this is all a bit much to take in. I mean, did my uncle inherit this farm too?” “Oh no.” Says Sasha. “He found this place one day when he got lost and stopped here to ask to for directions. He was the only other human to know about us because we live so far from human civilization.”

The entire time Sasha had been speaking, Tara continued staring at you, which kind of unsettled you. “What’s with her?” You ask, gesturing to Tara. “Oh, she’s always moody, that and you stepped on her tail. Pay her no mind.” Tara hissed at Sasha, but she ignored her.

“Are there any others like you?” You ask. “Oh yeah.” says Sasha. “There’s Bess the cow, Marie the mare, Jane the sheep, and Luna the bat. You’ll meet them tomorrow. In the meantime, you must be so tired after your long trip here, would you like to rest.” you nod, sleep sounds pretty good right now. “Come with me.” Says Sasha as she gets up and leads you upstairs as Tara gets back in her spot in front of the fireplace.

“Since your uncle passed on, I’ve been running things around here.” Says Sasha as she leads you up the stairs. “Now that you’re here, things can get back to normal.” “But how can you expect me to just give up my life to baby-sit a bunch of animals?” You say.

Sasha turns to you, a scowl on her face. “Isn’t that what you did before you came here?” You pause for a moment and realize that she’s right, that was basically what you did anyway. She takes your silence as a yes. “Well then, you can’t really complain, can you?” She says as she leads you to the bedroom. “Besides, I think you’ll like it much better here than in the city. It’s peaceful and quiet here, and all you really have to do is make sure we’re fed and cared for, and keep us company. It’s not like you’ll be doing any farm work around here.”

She open the door to the bedroom and leads pushes you inside. You can’t really make out the room due to the darkness, but you feel yourself flop onto a soft bed. Sasha crawls in next to you and cuddles up with you. “goodnight.” she says, licking you once more before falling asleep. After all you’ve been through, you fall asleep yourself. your last conscious thought is “When I wake up, I’m getting a cat-scan.”

When you wake up, you don’t open your eyes right away. You can feel you are in your bed by yourself, so you think what happened last night must have been a dream. But as you open your eyes, you see that it wasn’t. You’re not in your room, you’re in a strange room you’ve never seen. Guess it wasn’t a dream.

You get out of bed and head downstairs. In the kitchen, Tara sits at the table, lapping at a glass of milk, while Sasha stood in front of the stove with an apron, cooking eggs and bacon. “Good morning!” she says cheerfully as she places your plate at the table. You sit down, but don’t eat just yet.

“Where did you get the food?” You ask. “Oh, the eggs we get from our flock of chicken. They’re the only normal animals on the farm. The bacon we had in the freezer, and the milk we get from Bess. Speaking of whom, you might want to milk her today. The poor girl hasn’t been milked for weeks, now she’s so swollen it looks like she has two pink beachballs attached to her chest.”

“Anything else?” You ask, taking a bite of bacon. “Well, Jane needs to be sheared, Marie needs to be groomed, and you better keep an eye out for Vicky.” “Who?” You ask. “Vicky, that pesky fox from the forest at the edge of the farm. She’s always trying to steal our chickens and causing trouble. One more thing, Luna is normally asleep now, but maybe you should go wake her up just so she knows you’re here, since we rarely even see her.”
1.title: Inheritance

11.content:
“I guess I’ll go and milk the cow first.” You say. “From the sound of it, she needs my attention more than the rest.” “She’ll be grateful for that I’m sure.” Sasha says. “She’s probably still in the barn.” After you finish breakfast, you step outside and head towards the barn in the center of the farm. You open the door a crack and peek inside. Sunlight streams in from a small round window set in the top of the rear wall. The place looks the way you would expect any barn to look.


A workbench stood in one corner of the barn, next to a wall lined with tools. Opposite that was a row of stalls for cattle. You heard a light snoring sound coming from above. You look up and see a huge black shape hanging upside down from one of the rafters, its wings wrapped tightly around itself, obscuring its face. This, you assumed, must be Luna. You decide to let her sleep, she probably won’t appreciate being woken up during daylight hours.


Leaning against the stall door at the far end of the row, was an anthro cow. Her body from the neck down was hidden by the stall walls. Her muzzle was short and pink, and her face was mostly white with a back splotch over her right eye. Long black hair tied in a ponytail hung from her head to the small of her back. Her mouth continually moved sideways as she chewed her cud. Her elbows were propped on the top of the door, her head resting in her hands. She looks over at you and smiles. “Well hello there.”


Her voice was kind and gentle, like how a mother would speak to her child. “Hi.” You say. “I’m the new caretaker of the farm.” “Oh!” She says. “So you’re the one Derrick was talking about. He always spoke highly of you.” That confused you. You never even saw your uncle that much, so how could he have known you worked at an animal shelter, or have known enough about you to tell these strange animals? You just nod and say “I was told you are in need of milking.”


“Oh thank goodness.” She says with a sigh of relief, “I was beginning to worry that I would burst.” As you approached the front of her stall, she opened the door, and your eyes visibly widened, your jaw nearly hitting the floor. What Sasha had said about Bess’s breasts being as big as beach balls was an understatement.


They had to have been two feet across, each weighing at least twenty pounds. They were both pink, perfectly round, and completely hid the rest of her torso. As she stepped out of the stall, you could hear an audible sloshing sound as the milk inside her breasts shook around. It was now that you realized you had been staring at her. You feel your face burn red as you visibly blush.


Bess chuckles. “It’s okay dear.” She says, seemingly unfazed by your gawking. “This is perfectly normal when I go for weeks without being milked.” She points at the corner of the room to two large tubs. “You’re going to be needing those.”


You nod and quickly set the tubs down in front of her, next to each other. Bess bends over, allowing her engorged breasts to hang. The two pink, overflowing orbs putting visible strain on her back. “could you please get started now sweetie?” She says. “If I stay in this position with these babies for very long, I’m pretty sure I’ll snap in half.”


You get down on one knee next to her right breast, and gently grasp her nub between you thumb and index finger. You give it a light pinch and tug, and a small stream of milk squirts from her tit, echoing as it hit’s the inside of the tub. You get a feeling that this is going to take a while.

For half an hour you drain her right breast, squirt by squirt, Bess sighing with relief as the weight on her back ebbed away. As you milked Bess, you decided to chat with her to make the situation less awkward. “So, what’s life like here?” You ask. “Oh, it’s wonderful here.” She says. “So peaceful, wide open spaces, good company. The only real problem is Vicky.”


“Yeah, Sasha told me about her.” You say as you move from her right breast to her left, it having seemed to be completely drained, but still rather large, about the size of a basketball. “Sasha really hates her, and she’s not my favorite either.” Says Bess as you repeat the process on her other breast. “Once, she mixed some sort of hay that makes me produce milk even more than usual in with my regular hay. Then while I slept, she snuck in and tied string around my nipples. You think I’m big now? You should have seen me the next morning, I couldn’t even get out of my stall!”


“How did you know it was her?” You ask. “Who else could have done it? Sasha was ready to go into the forest after her herself, but you uncle managed to restrain her. We had more than enough milk for over a month after that.” You both laughed at that.


After you finally finished, Bess stood straight up allowing you to see the rest of her body. She had a nice trim body, with slender legs and hooves for feet. “Oh, my back is killing me.” Bess groaned, rubbing her sore back. “I can give you a nice massage later, when I’m done with my chores if you like.” you offer, which she eagerly accepts.


You look down at the two tubs, which are now filled to the brim with Bess’s milk. “What am I supposed to do with all this?” You ask. “Just leave them here.” Bess says. “I’ll take care of it.” You bid her farewell and leave to finish the other chores on your list.


Later that afternoon, you were walking past the barn, and you heard a light snoring sound coming from inside. You open the door a crack and peek inside. There, passed out on the floor, was Tara. She lay on her back, milk all over her face, her stomach looking as though she had swallowed a beach ball. “Oh, don’t tell me…” You say to yourself.


You step inside the barn, and…..yep, she did. Both tubs were empty. Tara drank the entire thing. You guess that, being a cat, it was in her nature. But still, Sasha probably wouldn’t be too happy about this. Tara licked her lips in her sleep, wiping away some of the excess milk, and smiled. You know she was kind of violent and moody usually, but when she was sleeping, she looked so peaceful and content.


You should probably wake her up, but doing that might result in you being maimed. Perhaps if you rubbed her now rounded belly, she would be calmer when she woke up? Or maybe you should just go tell Sasha and let her sleep?
11.title: Go milk Bess

choices: Go tell Sasha about the milk.
111.content:
You decide to try and wake Tara up. Now, you knew that Tara didn't like you, but that was just a first impression. Maybe if you tried being nice to her, she'd warm up to you. You thought long and hard about how you were gonna wake her. You didn't want to just yell "WAKE UP, TARA!". Not only would she be mad at you, but Luna would most likely get mad as well. After some thinking you decide to try and rub her belly.

You start with some gentle strokes, and she started to purr. Then you start rubbing her stomach for real. Tara starts to stir around in her sleep, eventually waking up. When she sees you she sneers at you.

"What do you want?" she asks, her voice full of contempt.

You were about to get angry, but then you remember that promise you made to yourself about being nice to Tara. You then say "I just wanted to know why you had to drink all that milk. I took me a while to get it, you know." You tried to say that in the nicest way you could.

"Oh, that.", she said. "I just couldn't help myself, I guess. Sorry."

Okay, no sarcasm, no evil looks, and she said sorry. Looks like the "be nice" plan was working faster than you thought it would, assuming that it would work at all.

"Oh, and I wanted to say that I'm sorry for stepping on your tail last night." You figured that apologizing for that incident would help put the water under the bridge.

Tara's eyes widened at what you said. Nobody ever apologized to her before. It was weird because she never cared if somebody apologized to her, no matter how angry it made her. Now all of a sudden a guy she knew for barely a day is doing it to her. It made her feel a little better about the whole thing.

"It's okay," she said. "And I'm s... ss... sorry for being so mean. I'm just kind of... like that. You know. Mean."

Saying the word "Sorry" is one thing, but actually apologizing was a whole other thing for Tara.

"Well," you say. "Why are you like that? You know. Mean."

"I'd rather not talk about it," she answered. She then lets out a yawn and goes back to sleep.

Well, Tara's finally starting to warm up to you. What now?
111.title: Rise and Shine

choices: Tara decides to talk to you.
1111.content:
"Well, I guess I'm gonna have to tell Sasha about the milk." you say to yourself. You walk over to the house and walk inside. "I had a feeling that you were gonna take a while." Sasha said. "It's been almost an hour and a half."

"Yeah, too bad it went to waste." you say rather quietly.

"What do you mean?" Sasha says, her sensitive hearing picking up what you said as if you said it out loud.

"Well... you see..." you begin to say.”Tara drank it all."

"All of it? Are you sure?" she asks in disbelief.

"It's hard to believe, but if you see her, you will."

Sasha lets out a frustrated sigh. "We could've been set for at least two weeks."

"Sorry."

"Don't be. It's not your fault." Sasha says. "I'll talk to Tara tonight."

"Go easy on her, okay." you say.

"Don't worry." she reassures. "I know how sensitive she is."

You leave the house to finish the rest of the chores. Luckily, you didn't see any sign of Vicky, which surprised Sasha. When you got home, you set up a TV that you had in your car in your room and started playing some video games. After about two hours, you got hungry, so you decided to go downstairs for some dinner. When you were near the kitchen, you heard Sasha and Tara talking in there, you peek in there, trying not to be seen, in order to hear what was going on.

"Tara, I know you drank all the milk." Sasha said.

"So what?" she said.

"I'm not mad, but I was a little frustrated when I heard. Why did you do it?"

"I was thirsty, I saw the milk, and I drank it." Tara said. "What else do you want to hear?"

"Tara, you've got to stop thinking about yourself. There's other people living here and-"

Tara interrupts Sasha with a frustrated grunt.

"What's your problem?" she says, getting mad.

"My problem is that I'm nineteen years old and you're talking to me like a child!" Tara yells.

"Well maybe if you stop acting like a child, I won't have to treat you like one!" Sasha snaps back.

"You know what Sasha? I'm DONE talking to you!" Tara gives another grunt and starts out the kitchen. You quickly run upstairs to your room, trying not to make any noise.

Later that night you walk over to Tara's room. You still don't know if you should talk to Tara. You finally got her to like you a little, and you didn't want to ruin it. You slowly open the door and walk inside. "Tara, you softly say. Tara turns her head towards you and seems surprised to see you."

"I heard what happened." you say. "Do you want to talk about it?"

What happens?
1111.title: Bad News

choices: Tara breaks down into tears and tells you about herself and the others as well
Shasha enters and sees the blood on your face and "jumps the gun" so to speak
11112.content:
"I heard what happened," you say, "Do you want to talk about it?"

She held her gaze for only a moment before turning away sulking down a bit where she laid. "No," was her only response. A cold and unforgiving "no." You were worried that you just lost any progress in earning her trust. Not only that, but you were truly worried Tara. You knew first hand what it was like to be treated like that. Moving a bit closer, you tried once more.

"I know that I'm definitely not you're favorite person right now, but if you need to talk... I'm hear to listen." You did your best to force a smile. Sadly, it was wasted.

"What I need is some sleep," Tara quickly snapped back, "Just leave me alone." You swear you heard a slight sniffle as she finished. You knew she didn't really mean that. After all, seldom does anyone really want to be completely alone.

You stepped closer reaching your hand out a bit, "Hey, I've been there and I know it's not fair." You pause for a moment, "People always telling you that everything you do is wrong. That your way is never going to work. And so they treat you like a child without even seeing things from your point of view.... It's not fair. "

"Don't touch me..." She whispers softly as her body tenses from your hands presence.

You smile once more, this time truly as you speak, "Trust me, it's helps to talk about stuff like this. If you don't, it'll eat you up inside." You slowly place your hand on her shoulder. Suddenly, you feel her whole body tense up all at once as she turns around faster than you could react. She slaps you across the face rather hard. Hard enough to knock up to the ground. Her face full of anger, she started shouting.

"What do you know about it?!" Tara's voice was loud and fierce, "About ME?! You're just some stupid kid who shouldn't even be here in the first place! You don't know a damn about my life, so don't come in here with your sentimental bullsh-" Tara stopped almost in the same breathe as you moved your had away from your face. Her slap had not only left claw marks, but was also slightly bleeding. The pain wasn't all that overcoming but it did sting like a the devil.

You look at our own hand for a moment and notice the light speckles of crimson here and there and determine that you must not be bleeding to badly. Though, it was enough to scare Tara.

"Oh God," the feline's tone was almost the exact opposite of what is was only a few seconds ago, "I-I'm sorry! I... I didn't mean to... It's just I- and you and..." Her began to tear up.

You did your best to give a smile tough the pain, "It's all right, I've been though worse." Quickly, the cat rushed over to look over the wound. After eying it with a panicked looked she rushed out of the room. You sat there confused and dazed, not sure what to think. You look up to see Tara hold a a small first aid kit, most likely the one from the bathroom. Shaking, she did her best to try to doctor the wound.

As she put some of the neosporin on the wound you can't help but greet your teeth. Tara looked down at wound with sadness in her eyes.

"You must hate after this... Don't you?" You stopped and looked up at her. "I don't blame you. I'm not friendly, I'm not cute and I'm not even a good friend..." You wanted to say something but the words wouldn't come. "I'm just cold, heartless, lazy, no good excuse for a cat." Slowly she began to cry, but as she did and despite her shaking, Tara did her best to mend the wound. As she was almost done, you finally found the words to say.

"I don't hate you Tara." The feline stopped dead in her place with a shocked look upon her face. "I try not to hate anyone. It's not in me. But I will say this..." You look right into her glowing yellow eyes, "You were right, I don't know a lot about you, but I want to. So will you tell me... Please?" Tara looked more shocked than she already did, completely taken back by what you said.

"Why?" was her only answer. A warm and surprised "why."

"Because, I want to be your friend."

What happened next?
11112.title: Mixed Reactions

11113.content:
Tara sniffs once, then buries her face in her hands and starts to sob. Oh great, you think, I made her cry just be asking her if she wanted to talk. You decide to try and calm her down, sitting next to her on the bed and gently stroking her back. "Please don't cry." You say. "I'm sorry if I hurt you.”


Tara shakes her head, turning to look at you, her eyes streaked with tears. "It's not you." She says. "Then why are you crying?" Tara sighs, staring at the floor. "You really want to know?" You nod.


"All my life I've had it hard." Tara says. " As a child, I was often picked on for my tail being so long. It didn't help that my full name is Tara Longtail. I would often get into fights at school, and I ended up getting expelled. I never exactly loved my parents either. They were still treating me like I was two when I was fifteen! That’s why I was so upset with Sasha, I don’t like being treated like a child. So I ran away from home.”


You listen to Tara intently. Now you begin to see why she was normally so bitter and mean. You couldn’t help but feel sorry for her, and on some levels you could relate to her. You were often bullied in school too, and you didn’t have many friends either. Hell, you never even went on a date.


You continue stroke Tara’s back as she continues, seeming to calm down. “For a few months I lived on the streets alone, eating out of garbage cans. During that time I became addicted to milk, cream, dairy in general. We cats naturally have a taste for the stuff, but it became a constant craving for me. Sometimes at night, when everybody is asleep, I’ll sneak out of the house to Bess’s stall and suck it out of her myself.”


Tara scoots closer to you and lays her head on your shoulder, her tail wrapping around your waist. “Then one day, I met this guy who said he felt pity for me, and he wanted to help me. He invited me to come stay with him. He even treated me to the first decent meal I had eaten in months. But when we got to his house, he said I wasn’t going to get to stay there for free. I told him I had no money, but that wasn’t what he was talking about. “


You instantly knew where her story was going, and tears began to flow from her eyes again. “Needless to say, he soon realized his mistake after I clawed him in the eyes and escaped. That’s when I swore to never trust anyone, ever again.”


“But here you are telling me your life story when only yesterday you wanted to kill me.” You say. “So you must trust me to some degree.” Tara doesn’t respond. Instead, she looks you in the eyes and suddenly grabs you in a hug. “Thank you.” She says. “I’ve never really had someone to talk to about this stuff. Now that I’ve gotten it off my chest, I feel much better.”


You hug her back and say, “If you ever want to talk again, I’ll be right here.” Then, you realize one thing about her story that didn’t make sense. “Wait a minute.” You say. “You said you went to school and lived on the streets. But that couldn’t have been around here, or anywhere on this planet! Where did you come from? I mean you, Sasha, all of you.”


Tara hesitates for a moment before saying…….
11113.title: Consoling Tara

111132.content:
You were taken aback by what Tara said. You knew that she, Sasha, and the others would have to be from some other planet. You didn't expect her to say that they were from another universe.

"A... another what?" you barely manage to say.

"Yeah, I know. It's a lot to take in." she says

"A lot?" you think. "This is freakin' bizarre!"

"Okay," you say. "So if you guys are originally from another universe, how did you get here?"

"Well, in our universe, there were reports of random dimensional holes appearing." Tara explains. "They appeared in a different place every time, but nobody was reported missing."

"So that explains how you guys got here." you say, finally starting to understand a little.

"Yeah." she said. "Prior to the incident, none of us knew each other, although Sasha and Vicky seemed to have some history. We just happened to be in the same place at the time the hole opened. We were just minding our own business when it hit, then it sucked us in and we all wound up landing on Earth on this farm, where your uncle was living, except for Vicky, who landed near a cave less than a mile away."

"So how did my uncle react to the fact that six furries were at his doorstep?" you ask.

"He was a little shocked at first, but he quickly warmed up to us." she says. "You're a lot like him, you know. Only younger. You're 21, right?"

"Yeah." you say. "If I knew that my uncle was so muck like me, I would've visited him more often."

"We all missed him after he died, but..." she says. "At least we have you now." Tara hugs you again, her tail still wrapped around you. Then she says something that totally takes you by surprise.
111132.title: A Voyage of Universal Proportions

choices: Sasha saw through the slightly opened door.
1111321.content:
"Wait, what?" you ask in disbelief. "Sorry, I thought that you asked me if you could kiss me."

"I did," Tara says, looking at the ground and blushing.

Needless to say, this was a surprise to you. You were at a loss for words. Sure, Tara was pretty in her own right, but was it really okay to kiss a girl a day after you met her, even though she's the one asking for the kiss?

When you think about it, however, it makes sense that Tara would become attracted to you so quickly. You were the first guy to show her kindness in years, and she trusted you enough to tell her life story to you. Hell, she probably hasn't even told Sasha. Besides, if you didn't kiss her, the sense of rejection would make Tara depressed again, and you'd be right back where you started.

"Are you alright?" Tara said. "You seem to be staring off into space."

"I'm fine. It's just that I've never kissed a girl before." you say without thinking.

"Are you serious?" Tara asks in disbelief.

"Yeah...." you say, embarrassed.

"Well, if it makes you feel better, I've never kissed a guy." she says.

Well this was just perfect. Not only was she asking to kiss you, she was now asking to be your first kiss and for you to be her first kiss. You were having a dilemma. But to reiterate, Tara was cute. Who knows? Maybe furry girls may turn out to be better kissers than human girls.

"Okay, you can kiss me." you say.

Tara's face instantly went red. "Wow, I wasn't expecting you to say yes." she says. After a few awkward seconds, Tara leans in, closing her eyes. You start to do the same, then your lips meet with hers. Tara puts her arms around you and coils her tail around your back. The kiss actually felt really nice. Tara's lips were soft, and the fur on her face and body felt good.

Unbeknownst to the two of you, somebody caught sight of your kiss.
1111321.title: You and Tara Sitting in a Tree, K-I-S-S-I-N-G!

11113211.content:
Once she accidentally fully opened the door, Sasha saw your lip lock with Tara. Nonetheless, you were all shocked, one for other reasons than just the situation.

You saw the husky's eyes, in a neutral shock. Then she ran away, but what was heard is...
11113211.title: Sasha saw through the slightly opened door.

11113212.content:
When you and Tara broke the kiss, you were lost in each other's eyes. Just then, you heard snickering coming from outside the window.

"Isn't that cute?" the voice said. Tara turned to the window in shock. "Vicky!? What the hell are you doing here?" she yells.

"I overheard your argument with Sasha and knew that you would run up here crying, so I decided to climb up here and watch. Unfortunately I had a little trouble getting up here, but I was able to get up just in time to see you too sucking each other's faces." she says. Then she looks at you. "By the way, we haven't officially met . I'm Vicky. Just so you know, if you ever want a real woman, my den is not too far away." She points in the direction of her den.

"You're such a cheap whore, Vicky." Tara says.

"You know, it's not proper for a little girl to use adult words like that." Vicky says.

"I'm nineteen, and you're only three years older than me." Tara says bluntly.

"Watch it, kitten." Vicky says. "You don't want me to tell Sasha about this, do ya?"

"What would it matter to her?" you ask.

"I don't know, but I do know that she won't take it well." With that, Vicky jumped from the tree and ran off.

The next morning...
11113212.title: Peeping

choices: Vicky tries to blackmail you later on.
111132122.content:
You wake up the next morning with Sash nudging you to get up.

"Rise and shine, sleepyhead." she says with a smile. "Breakfast is ready." She then walks out of the room. As you make your way to the kitchen, you start thinking to yourself.

I wonder if Vicky told Sasha about what happened. She didn't seem aware of it. She could be just acting, though. Maybe Vicky assumed wrong and Sasha was okay with it. Gah! I'm thinking too much, there's no way she knows.

By the time you were done thinking, you had reached the dinner table, where Tara was lazily lapping her milk, as usual.

"Marie wanted me to help her with something today, so I'll be busy for awhile." Sasha says to the two of you. "You won't need anything, right?"

"Nothing that I can think of." Tara answers.

"Same here." you say.

"Okay then." Sasha says. "See you guys later."

You wait for Sasha to be out of hearing range then turn to Tara. "You don't think that Vicky told her did you?"

"It doesn't seem that way. It's so weird. Normally, Vicky's mouth would run like water."

"I heard that." you hear someone say. You and Tara turn to the nearby window and see Vicky there, smiling.

"Why didn't you tell Sasha?" you ask. "You're not planning to blackmail us, are you?"

"Why would I do that?" she coyly asks back. "I don't have anything that I can blackmail you into doing, anyway." She turns around and walks away.

"Not yet, at least..." she says quietly, snickering to herself.
111132122.title: Surprising Silence

1112.content:
You go to the barn and see a giant fluff ball of white fur, you move some of the hair to see two light blue eyes. Sasha was right when she had said Jane has been sheered in a while.

"So your Jane right?" You asked making the puff ball move. "I don't know, are you trying to nod?" You ask again making the puffball move. "Could you please say yes?"

"Y..yes." The puffball spoke in a soft gentle voice.

"Ok, um do you know where the sheers are?" You ask. A small hand pokes out of the fur pointing to a nearby crate that had sheep shears on it. You pick them up, turning them on and you begin to shear Jane. You decided to start a conversation, "So...what's it like to be a sheep?" Jane remains silent as you shear her. When you were done you saw she looked very nice without all of that wool. You looked down and saw all of the pile of wool at yours and her feet. "I better clean this up."

"I-its fine, I'll get it." Jane stated. Your surprised to hear her speak a bit, but you shrug it off and
1112.title: Go shear Jane.

choices: A warm smile (she was planning this)
Panic! (She didn't know this would happen)
113.content:
You decide it would be best to let Tara sleep. After seeing how pissed she was last night at you for stepping on her tail, waking her up from her nap would be a death wish. You decide that since you're in the barn, you might as well check how Bess is doing. You'll tell Sasha about the milk later. You open the door to Bess's stall, and see her lounging on a pile of hay. "Hello again, dear." she says with a warm smile. "Hello." You say "Feeling better?"



"Oh yes. It's so nice to have all that weight off my chest. Good thing I have a strong back, or I would have snapped like a twig!"



The two of you chuckle at that remark. "You know, Tara just drank all the milk I got from you earlier." "Really?" She says, surprised. "I mean, she usually takes a pint or two, but I didn't think her stomach could hold all that!" There is a brief pause, before you break the silence when you say "Well, since I'm here, do you still want that massage I promised?" Bess smiles and nods. "Oh please, I would really appreciate that." She sits up from the hay pile, crossing her legs indian style. You sit behind her and begin with her neck and shoulders, working your way down to the base of her spine, and back up again. Bess moos in satisfaction, enjoying your little "treatment".



"You're a natural at this dear." She says "How did you get so good at this?" "I've had a lot of practice." You reply "My mom cleaned houses for a living, and would always come home saying her back hurt from working all day. She would practically beg me to rub her back to make it stop." As you continue to rub Bess down, the two of you start chatting. "So, how much milk do you produce a day?" You ask just to get the conversation going. " A gallon or so in each udder. That's just without eating anything. When I worked at the plant on our home planet, I could produce up to ten gallons an hour."



"Wait a minute, you guys are from, another planet?"



"Of course! Did you really expect us to be from Earth?"



Now that you think about it, it was a stupid question. "I'm sorry. so, what was this plant you worked at?" "It was basically like what you call a dairy farm. Rows of stalls for cows like me, each with a chair, a pile of hay, and a milking machine. Basically, I got paid to just sit around and eat all day." "Sounds like anyone's dream job." You say. "Well, it was really the only career choice we cows have if we don't want our milk to go to waste. Plus, the milk machines tend to get a little rough on the udders after a few hours or so. I prefer it by hand."



She went on to say how all cows on their planet were naturally well endowed like her, and become swollen after going so long without be milked. Believe it or not, while Bess's breasts would be considered quite large here on Earth, back home, she would be considered an average bust size. "Man,you cowgirls must have spines of steel!" You both laughed at that. After half an hour or so of massaging, you finally stop. Bess wraps her arms around you and hugs you tightly. you can't help but blush at the feeling of her breasts squishing against your chest. "Thank you very much dear." She says "My back feels so much better now." "No problem." You say, patting her on the back. "But you must be thirsty after all the work you've done today. Let me help you with that."



To your surprise, she places you in her lap, and pushes your head towards her right "udder". You look up at her with a quizzical look. "You mean you want me to..." "Go ahead, drink up." She says with a motherly smile. You were rather thirsty, and you didn't want to offened Bess, so you gently take her nipple into your mouth and gingerly begin to suckle. Warm, creamy milk flows from her tit down your throat, while Bess gives a light moo of contentment. You close your eyes and begin to actually enjoy this. Here Bess was, nursing you as if you were her own baby.



After ten minutes or so, you open your eyes and release Bess's nipple from the confines of your mouth. But you recieve the biggest shock of your life when you see that you body has changed! Firstly, you have shrunken down to the size of a toddler. Also, your skin is covered by a thin layer of black and white fur, and your feet have been replaced with hooves! Two small horns protrude from your head, and a long, thin tail with a tuft of fur on the end swishes lazily behind you. Bess's milk has turned you into an anthro calf! Bess cradles you in her arms as she looks down at you with...
113.title: Mother's Milk

choices: Accept and receive your new mother's breastmilk.
1131.content:
To add more shock Bess had expected this. "I would have done this to your Uncle but he was too old to be my calf and he politely declined my advances. You, on the other hand were easier to persuade than I could ever have anticipated. Now you are my little calf, my little baby." That final sentence hit you like a bullet to the head, but with a more drastic effect. Your voice is full of fear and hesitant to even speak. "But why would you do THIS to me? This wasn't necessary." Bess looks at you with a look of real concern. "Now you look the part as my baby. Sasha will understand and will take over. I need a companion though, and what better than a calf of my own."

Bess appears very intent to own you but you're naturally unsure. She seems like an ideal mother figure, but do you really want to be her baby calf?
1131.title: My Intentions All Along

11311.content:
Of course not, you're a grown man. Or at least you used to be. You weren't going to take this, even if her milk was the best thing you've ever tasted. You try to scream but it only comes out as a weak moo. Bess didn't even try to stop you because you sounded so adorable. The only being that didn't like the noise was Tara, whom you woke up from her nap.

"Keep it down over there Be-" She stopped mid sentence when she saw you in Bess' arms. "Where the hell did you get a kid?"

"Tara, it's me. I'm not a calf, her milk changed me-" Bess tried to cover your mouth but Tara heard it and couldn't believe it. She wanted to laugh out loud but did something else instead.
11311.title: Scream for help.

11312.content: You decide to run away.
11312.title: Run away and tell Sasha.

113121.content: Bess catches you and picks you up before you can get away. Does she punish you?
113121.title: Bess catches you

1131211.content: How does she punish you?
1131211.title: yes

113122.content: You manage to run away and make it to Sasha and you tell her what happened to you. Does she believe you?
113122.title: You make it to Sasha

choices: You are awoken by a loud commotion outside
1132.content:
Bess had her eyes closed as she nursed you, enjoying the feeling of you suckling from her teat. But when you stopped, she looked down and instantly started to panic when she saw what her milk had done to you. She cradled you in her arms as she paced back and forth, a worried expression on her face as she talked to herself.


" Oh dear, oh dear, oh dear, how could this happen? What am I going to do? How will I explain this to the others?" She stops for a moment, and hugs you tightly to her soft, pink bosom. "I'm so sorry dear! I swear I had no idea this would happen!" You open your mouth to speak, but all that comes out is a little mooing noise. Looks like you've lost the ability to speak.


Finally, Bess decides she might as well tell Sash about this, no point trying to hide it. She lays you down on your back in a pile of hay. "I'll be right back." With that, she lease to get Sasha. While she's gone, you look over your new, diminutive body. The thing that felt the strangest was how your feet had been replaced by hooves. You try to stand up to test them out, but only manage to take a couple wobbly steps before falling onto your front. Those were going to take some getting used to.


When Bess comes back she opens the stall door, and Sasha looks down at you with a mix of disbelief, and frustration on her face. "You mean to tell me that (your name) turned into this, just by drinking from your boob?" Bess blushes as she nods and picks you up, holding you like a baby. "I don't understand it either. It would seem my milk has this effect on humans. But why didn't it happen to Derrick then?"


"Derrick was lactose intolerant, he never drank any of the milk he got from you."


Sasha sighs, then furrows her brow in concentration for several minutes before finally saying "I guess the only thing we can do is raise him again." "I'll do it." Says Bess "It's my fault this happened to him, I should be the one to take the responsibility." Sash nods "Good point. Well, I better go tell the others about this. Though I doubt they'll believe it."


As Sasha leaves, Bess curls up with you on a pile of hay for a nap. "Don't worry, sweetie." She says "I promise I'm gonna make up for this. I'll take really good care of you, count on it." You fall asleep, snuggling up to your new mother.
1132.title: Meet Your New Mommy

choices: You're back to normal! The effects wear off!
11321.content: You wake up when sunlight shined in you're eyes. Then, with your eyes still closed, you stretch your arms. When you're done stretching, you open your eyes and realise...
11321.title: The next day

113211.content: are you full normal or half normal?
113211.title: full or half

1132111.content:
Your hands rose and your eyes widened with disbelief. In front of you were full grown human hands! You were back to normal!

"Moo..."

A low cow of a groan escaped from beside you causing you to turn your head. Bess started to stir, wondering what the commotion was about and slowly her eyes rose to you. A brief pause ensued before her eyes widened.

"You're back to normal!" Bess gasped, coming fully awake.

You smiled and nodded. "Yeah, I was afraid I was going to stay like a cow forever! It didn't help that I couldn't talk!"

A sad smile played on Bess' lips and her ears flopped down a little. "Ah...well hon, I'm happy the effects of my milk wore off. I'm sorry about that, by the way. I didn't know you'd transform into that."

You could hear the disappointment in Bess' voice. It was obvious that, despite your situation being an accident, she was a little happy. The thought of having her own foul pleased her it seemed. You were a little happy too that Bess was willing to take care of you in the possibility that you didn't turn back.

"No, I should thank you Bess. You were ready to take care of me in the case that I didn't change back. You would've been a great mother, I'm sure," you praised; however, your words only seemed to make her sadder.

"I...I still want to be actually," she admitted with a light blush, turning away slightly.

You were confused as you didn't understand what she was talking about. "What do you mean?"

Bess faced you with sad eyes. "I...I still want to be your mother..."

This declaration surprised you a bit, but before you could open your mouth, Bess elaborated.

"...you've always taken good care of me, hun. I only feel its right to take care of you now...whether you are human or anything else. I hope you don't think of me as selfish or weird, but that's how I feel," she explained.

You were actually touched by Bess. Indeed, the thought of being taken care of her seemed more realistic now especially after you transformed. There was a problem though.

"Even if you wanted to be my mother, how would you take care of me? I'm 18 and can pretty much handle myself," you questioned.

Bess nodded with understanding. "I just want to be there for you sweetie; like you and your uncle have been there for me and the other animals. That's why, I'll ask you...will you allow me to help you and take care of you from now on? I want to do the little things...making you breakfast, tucking you in,, and nurturing you...so, please?"

Making breakfast? She could do that? Certainly, that wasn't impossible or unlikely for that matter given their human-like structure. You weren't sure about being tucked in, but it certainly sounded nice. Finally, what could she mean by nurturing him?

Normally, you'd simple reject her offer, but you were her foul for a short period so you knew the feeling. It was nice...but at the same time, you weren't supposed to be an adopted son of a cow, you were the caretaker!
1132111.title: Human!

11321111.content:
To be honest, you were actually considering her offer! After all, you were the only person around after you inherited the farm. It would be nice to have some form of companionship...even if it's through maternal love.

Slightly blushing, you looked away and cleared your throat. "I...guess that'll be fine. I mean, I see no harm in it."

Bess gasped with stars in her eyes and suddenly grabbed you, hugging you to her large chest.

"Oh thank you hun! I promise I'll take good care of you!"

You struggled a little and pushed back with you hands in order to catch you breath. Bess was quick to see she was smothering you and loosened her hold allowing you some space to breathe.

With a gasp, you pulled out a little and rested you head just above her chest. Hearing her soothing heartbeat calmed you down a little; however, you were a little ashamed to find that your little neighbor had gone erect. You didn't want Bess to know, so you kept your bottom half with some distance.

"Uh...it'll be weird to call you mother though," you explained with a slight blush, "...I'm not sure if I can do that."

Bess frowned, but nodded slowly. "Of course, sweetie. I don't expect you too, but I hope that you'll get used to me being around you more."

You didn't say anything but contemplated whether your decision was the right one. Right now, it didn't seem that bad. The fact that you were the only human on the farm helped a little too.

"What's going on here? I heard some squeals. Are those damn pigs bothering this barn?" Sasha came in, wondering what the commotion was.

She stopped and stared wide-eyed at you. "Well I'll be...you turned back to normal!"

"Yeah," you breathed a sigh of relief, "...thankfully."

Sasha put her hands on her lips and grinned. "Well Bess here must be disappointed. There's no need to take care of you anymore."

Bess smiled and giggled. "Maybe not as a cow, but he's agreed to become my adopted foul. I think he deserves to be taken care of after all he's done for me...and us."

Sasha raised her furry eyebrow. "Your foul? You can't be serious, Bess. He's human!"

Bess frowned. "...and? We can talk and walk like a human. There's not really much we can't do compared to humans."

Sasha was about to protest but then caught herself. She sighed and waved her hands. "Fine, do what you want. If you plan to take care of him, I hope you realize that you can't be sitting in the barn all day. Your going to have to start helping around."

Bess shrugged. "That's fine by me...I've always felt guilty whenever I see you working so hard around the farm."

Sasha shook her head and left the barn mumbling. It was clear she thought it was ridiculous and the relationship wasn't going to last long. Bess was determined to prove her wrong.

She looked back at you held comfortably across her chest. You looked back at her, taken back a little by the warn, maternal eyes that stared at you. It was a little overwhelming to be honest. Not even your real mother stared at you like that.

"Uh...can you not stare so much?" you requested, feeling a little embarrassed.

This seemed to further incite Bess at how embarrassed you were. "Oh baby...your reactions are just going to make me want to hold you and cuddle you more!"

You looked away and had to take a deep breath, trying to focus your mind as you felt yourself feeling a little hazy. Her maternal aura was definitely overwhelming and you weren't sure if you should be weirded out or comforted.

Taking you by surprise, she lifted you up with her arms causing an audible gasp from you. She was actually pretty strong!

Bess giggled. "Oh hon, you're so light!"

You turned red in slight shame. Honestly, you didn't want to think you were skinny or of the sort.

"C-could you put me down, please? I'm not a baby," you requested with a little stuttering.
11321111.title: Accept her offer.

choices: No, there wouldn't be enough room (truth or excuse)
113211111.content:
With a mixture of playfulness and love, she giggled and shook her head.

"I don't think so baby. Just relax and let me handle everything. You've worked way too hard," she refused.

You attempted to open your mouth in protest but realize that Bess was in her own dreamland. She apparently was enjoying this and you figured you didn't want to spoil her mood. Besides, it was oddly comforting to hear that from her.

You and her traveled close to the farmhouse and stopped just before the door.

"Now sweetie, you'll allow me to enter the house with you from now on, right?"

You were a little surprised she was asking for your permission. While you knew your uncle had only allowed Sasha and Tara in, you really didn't mind as long as they were clean and weren't tracking mud.

"Um...I don't mind. Just make sure your clean," you explained.

Bess giggled and reached down to lightly kiss your forehead. You blushed and coughed in embarrassment, but said no more. This was going to get some getting used to.

"Oh don't worry baby, I may have lived in the barmhouse, but I do get up and take daily baths early in the morning. Speaking of which, have you?"

You blinked and looked away. "I...uh...I planned to take a shower after I had finished milking you...but then I turned into a cow...and yeah...now I need a shower."

Bess' eyes glimmered as if you just gave her the best opportunity ever. You stared at her, fearing that you gave her some unneeded ideas.

"Well baby, why don't we take a bath together!"

There it was, just like you had predicted.
113211111.title: Bess refuses.

1132111112.content: Was it the truth, or an excuse so you could think about things?
1132111112.title: No, there wouldn't be enough room (truth or...

113212.content: You wake up and moo softly.... your eyes adjusting to the dark barn. you move your hands and feel something big a very soft and warm. You squeeze it to figure out what it is to your surprise you hear bess. "Ohhh.... moooo♡" your eyes finally adjust to see one of Bessie breast in front of you. She looks at you at says "Good morning baby"
113212.title: You're still a calf.

11322.content:
Your initial thought of having the relive growing up with a anthro cow mother was as if someone was playing a cruel joke on you. This new live on the farm, however, didn't take as long as you thought it would have. When compared to humans, young anthros grow very quickly. Seven weeks ago you were a toddler suckling Bess as she carried you in her arms, but now you are somewhere in the teen state of your redevelopment. It was hard for Bess to have to stop feeding you everyday as you can eat for yourself, but you still occasionally indulge yourself.

Even though you spent quite some time in your new body, you still aren't completing comfortable. The hooves on your feet wouldn't flex when your were walking, causing you to trip and fall multiple times. Luckily you still the fingers on your hands or else life would have been so much harder. Your fur covered the entirety of your body, but you still felt completely naked.At your request, Sasha sheared Jane's wool at did her best to fashion some clothes for you.

Now that you're able to do some work, you milk your adoptive mother everyday. Figuring you slept in the barn with her, you catch her literally first thing in the morning. Today was no different as you set everything up around Bess who is still half asleep.

"Hello sweetie." she yawns. "Did you sleep well?"

"Could have been better. My back is killing me." you answer back to her. You pull the second tub into place without much effort. You doubt you would've move the tub this if your were a human teenager, but apparently anthros are that bit stronger.

"Poor dear...If you're hurt, you shouldn't overdo it." she said obviously worried.

"I'm fine. This is farm life after all right...more or less?"

"I suppose it is." You continue the milking session, making ideal conversion with the cow. Despite both of you knowing that your mind is still that of an adult's, she still speaks as if you are her precious calf. With the first tub full, you were instructed that you were finished.

"Is it just me or are you making less milk than before?" asked you in your curiosity.

"No. The first time you did it that day was because I've haven't been taken care for a long time. And ever since you've drained my udders everyday, one way or another." she looked directly at you with endearingly. "Thanks (your name), I've never been happier in my life. You make my day brighter, and you help with my back; it never felt this good."

"Thanks, Bess, but can you please not talk about backs right now...I wonder if I can take an aspirin." you remarked as you lean and stretch out your spine. While your head is looking up, you do not see Bess inspecting you. She reaches for you shirt and starts to lift it before you know what she doing. "Ah! What are you..."

"Hold still, I need to see something." She gave a stern look showing you she was serious.

"O-okay..." you folded. She lifts your shirt again, revealing the fur trapped underneath. Suddenly she gasps. "Hun...I-I think I know why your back is stiff."

You were shocked. It can't be, can it? You whip your shirt off and see the problem. Your chest now has two boobs that are already looking stacked for your figure. How could you have messed those? She grabs onto one of your nipples with her fingers and pinches it. You start to feel weird as she is touching you, but you are too shaken at the moment to oppose her. To both of your increasing surprise, milk flies out in just a matter of seconds.

"Well, I guess you are supposed to be around that age." she thinks out loud.

"What...what do we do...?" you nearly scream.

With a bit of silence, she leads you to the tub. Now she was the one draining you, emptying your udders. After she was done, you mind cleared up a little. Bess hugs your head and whispers, "I'll go get Sasha, then we'll go from there." She gets up and exits the barn.

Now you were alone with a new lactating rack. Many things are racing through your mind, but one outweighs them all. 'Are you a girl now?' You were desperate to know this as soon as you can. Using this opportunity, you peek to see that...
11322.title: Skip a few weeks ahead

113221.content:
Nothing. It was just gone. Staring was not going to fix this. You lost pretty much everything you could think of that you had before you came to the farm.

"Mmm..." the ears on top of your head twitch as Sasha and Bess approached from behind you. You realized that you still had your pants open and quickly try to hide what you were doing. Unfortunately, Sasha understood what was going through your head. "Well, let me be honest, I had a felling this was going to happen."

You were confused in how she saw this coming. "Wait what do you mean?"

Instead of Sasha, Bess answered with a look of regret. "Well, you didn't really show the signs of a bull when you were growing. You were supposed to get bulkier, your horns bigger, full coat of fur in mostly one color. But rather than that, you looked...almost exactly...like me..."

"Bess...it's not your fault." you attempted to soothe her. "I 'm not hurt or anything. It just...different."

"But...I took so much away from you." Bess nearly cried out.

Even if it wasn't sincere, you forced a smile, "but I knew my life was going to change at this farm."

Sasha saw that Bess held a mixed expression of understanding and remorse. After a few seconds, she continued, "In any case, this raises another problem."

Bess jumped in. "Between the two of us, there soon might be too much milk flowing." If you really end up as Bess, you seriously doubt Tara could keep up.

"Well, we can manage." Sasha grabbed the tub and moved it to the side.

Since you can't really think of anything else, you left the barn and pondered your situation. There was a small boulder a bit in the distance that you sat on as you gathered your thoughts. You were truly at a loss on what you should do. You see the large clump of wool that was Jane a good ten yards away. The top of her coat had a noticeable dent that was used to make your clothes. You weren't sure what she was doing, but see turned around and ran as fast as she could without falling victim to her own wool weight.

Was she being shy or was she scared? You guessed she was looking in your direction, so there was something behind you? Before you could check, a figure jumped over you and stopped in front of you. It turned out to only be Marie, but it still scared you half to death. "Sorry about that." she apologized , "Force of habit."

"Geez... Next time, can you give someone a warning?!" you shrieked. "I couldn't really get a hint from Jane, either. She saw you coming and left me here without saying a word."

"Yeah, you know how she is...But I say it was because of that that she ran."

"What do you mean?" you asked, not catching her drift.

"You should be shy too if you saw that." She points at your chest. You forgot your shirt at the barn so your pink udders are revealed. You instantly cover yourself with your arms in front of Marie.

"Why me..?"

"You don't have to be shy though. Bess already told me. So now you're one of the girls." Marie encouraged.

"One of the girls..?" you repeated, weighing that information in your mind.

"Just remember, we are in this together." She pats your head before trotting away.

You weren't sure of this was supposed to make you feel better or worse. However, you knew pouting was not going to be helpful. You jump down from the boulder and feel your chest swaying upon landing. You just got them taken care of a few minutes ago, yet they already feel like they're starting to build up again. Still, that is not your only problem as you are still shorter than you were before.

You were concentrating when the tip of your bovine tail hit someone. Your ears and every bit of fur on your body stood on end as you turned to see...
113221.title: The Odd One...In?

1132212.content:
You can only catch a glimpse of an orange blur before you are tackled to the ground. With the sudden ambush leading your head to the ground, you winced in pain as your aggressor looms over you. When your eyes open again, the face of a grinning fox woman stared back, not pinning you in place but asserting a predatory dominance all the same.

Fear compelled you to call for help, but this fox was quick to cover your mouth. "Shh...No noises! I want to get a good look on you." She whispered. Taking into account that you were turned into a calf on day one, you have not met Vicky before. You remember a few days when you were in the barn and you heard gunshots whenever Sasha would drive her away, but you never saw her up close. With her face inches away, you can cross that off your list. For that matter, she was taking note of you as well. "Seems like the old man left a gift before he kicked it. I didn't think he had it in him, having a kid with her."

You were not given time to mentally point out the flaws in her statement before she poked at one of your exposed pink udders. You felt her digit stick into the skin as it got surrounded by the rest of the udder. The sensation caused you to reflexively arch your back, which did not help. "Looks like you can start making milk soon. You wouldn't want it to go to waste, do ya? Why not let Vicky here have something to drink when it becomes a problem, okay?" She cooed at your vulnerable state.

As much as you were scared, you were also getting pissed. She had no idea what was going on and you were not sure how you yourself were going to deal with it. The tension in your body telling you to act continued to build as she twirled her finger around the deflated mound. As she kept playing with you, you curl your back and were able to place your hoofs onto her torso. Before she knew what hit her, your legs pushed with impressive strength that launched her into the air. Feeling the sunlight caused you the breathe a sigh of relief. You were glad that you were able to get her off of you, though you were not sure why you though that in particular would work.

The sense was snapped out of you when the sound of Vicky hitting the ground rang your eardrums. After groaning for a bit, Vicky flipped upright with a different set of predatory eyes. "You're going to pay for that!" She growled.

As she brandished her claws, a shot interrupted her second assault before it started. Not taking a chance to look back, Vicky dashed away in panic. Her frantic footsteps were soon drowned out by Sasha's screaming. The dog anthro came charging on as quickly as her bipedal form allowed her, maybe even surpassing her normal limit. She crashed into a slide as she covered you from your fleeing assailant.

Every other time you heard her shout, she had used typical threats any homesteader would throw at those in crossed into their land. This time around, she was beyond barking mad. It also made you unnerved as she used her free hand to guard you and the other to point the shotgun. If a shot was fired, you were worried about not only the bullet, but the recoil as well.

"I'm getting sick and tired this shit, Vicky! Run like a bitch! But I am just about done with giving you warnings!" Her loud voice gave way to panting for air. She turns her head to see you slowly composing yourself. With a sigh, she raised the barrel skyward and offered you a hand. "Sorry. She's really on my last nerve. But...She didn't hurt you, did she? That stance...it looked like she was ready to..." She continue as her grip on the stock grew firmer.

"Nonono no no no! I am fine. I...kicked her off me, I guess." You spoke the truth no matter if you believed it. "Ummm...Were you serious back there?"

She hesitated to respond to the question. "No. At least...I don't think I really would bring myself to shoot her or anything like that."

"Saying 'at least' does not really calm me down."

"I mean, I wouldn't do it if she tried to take some chickens or pull 'some' pranks. Get it?"

"Kinda digging a bigger hole here."

"Look! She better not lay even her eyes on you!" She blurt out to stop your replies. "I'm not going to let anything happen to you, or anyone else. Especially since..." She stopped herself. Taking a moment to unload the gun, Sasha turned away. "Today is quite a day."

The guard dog took her leave as you can see her pinch the bridge of her nose. You shot one last glance in the direction Vicky ran off to before you shake off your remaining fears. You can say with confidence that you never had that kind of experience before. You felt like you were completely venerable one second, and came out overpowering near the end. Granted it was only one move, but you did it without even thinking about it.

If you meet her again, however, you are not sure if it will work for you again. If not, she would be able to do what she wanted with you. "Why not let Vicky here have something to drink when it becomes a problem, okay?" Her words rang in your head. You are barely coming to terms with your transformation and her idea was to use you as a milkshake machine. As your thoughts pass, you unconsciously place your hands on your new pair of twins on your front. You then noticed that they are slightly engorged with more milk. It was not even that long since you have last been milked dry. Vicky might be right, this could be a problem.

--At the Barn Hours Later--

Anytime when you were a normal young man, your mind would constantly changed its train of thought towards sex. One fantasy you thought never be achieved was becoming a woman and being able to grope yourself whenever you pleased. Now, you were pinching yourself but not for any kind of kinky act. Milk kept building in your chest and the weight was getting noticeable. You tried to take care of this before it becomes a problem, but to no avail.

"Sorry sweetie, that is not going to work." Bess came up to you with a pail. "If we could milk ourselves, giant, back-breaking boobs wouldn't be an issue. It has to come from someone or something else."

"Then how did you do it when you were raising me?" You asked as you were getting more frustrated.

"You helped..." Bess said without looking into your eyes. It was obvious that she was blaming herself for this. Not only for this little crisis, but for everything that happened to you. That just got you feeling bad. You knew she was only trying to be comforting but things just seemed to keep getting worse.

You did not really know what to say in this situation, but you had to try something. "Bess, as much as you are beating yourself up over this, you know it's not your fault. No one could have guessed that drinking anthro milk would turn you into one. You still did your best to help me. Even if you're feeling guilty, you also did it because you care." You tried to convey your voice in a mixture of convincing and heartfelt.

Bess took a moment to digest what you said. She lifted her head to meet your gaze. Then she started to smile, but not her motherly one rather an amused one. "I sometimes forget that you still have a full-grown mind. It just seems out-of-place when you say such intelligent things in such a childish voice..."

'Wait, I have a childish voice now?' You thought to yourself. You could not really dismiss that that would not be unexpected.

"...When you began talking again, it took you no time flat to get the sounds and words out. I guess that saved me some time and effort." Bess continued to smile. It was a little contagious.

"Well...laying in a stall and eating hay did take some getting used to. They can't all be winners." You offered to lighten the mood. Bess nodded as readied the pail, preparing remove to the weight on your chest. It was not like what you had earlier, but she understood that you were new to it. You hoped you would not need to fill that tub for a long time.

When milk started to enter the pail, the both of you grew silent. You blushed as you are forced to remain still as Bess worked to empty your udders. You were stuck facing her, seeing her expression shift slightly. With this kind of silence, she was probably thinking of something. That might not be good.

"So...Vicky wasn't trouble, was she? Sasha said you kicked her away."

"Yeah. Not quite sure how that happened."

"We cows anthros have powerful legs. We need them for obvious reasons." She answered. "Anyway, you need to be more careful. That trick will not work a second time."

"A second time?" You questioned. "You make it sound like she wants to eat me."

Bess shook at the remark, "No no. But you know, she's, pardon the pun, clever like a fox. I just don't want you to get hurt again."

"But I didn't even get hurt this time." You pout. Her concern is apparent, making you feel guilty for arguing with her.

"Yeah. And to be honest, she'll probably doesn't want to either, but that doesn't mean she's good." You fell silent, leaving only Bess to continue as she drained your udders. "Since it was the first time she saw you, she probably had her guard down. And while everything here being tight-knit has its advantages, that also means that you will definitely see her again. I don't know what she'll do, but she now knows your one good trick."

She is coming from the best of intentions, but her words of concern were having another effect on you. After the short milking session finished, the feeling that compiled in your head expressed...
1132212.title: Up Close and Personal

113222.content:
You discover to your surprise that your package is still there. In fact it appears to be larger than before. You scratch your head to wonder at this conundrum and feel your fingers bump into something. You soon realise that the something was a pair of horns.

Soon, Sasha and Bess return, And see you feeling your horns.

“I thought you said he was a girl?” Sasha said

“Well, he does have a rack.” Said Bess

“But I’m a guy. How can I have a rack?” You ask

“It seems likely that you are a futa” Said Bess “Or a guy with a rack”

Sasha walks over and feels your rack, causing you to moan slightly.

“He’s still got some growing to do” Sasha said.

“Is he a futa?” Bess asks

“What's a futa?” You ask.

“A futa is a gender that consists of both make and female….parts” Bess said, blushing hevally. “They are known for producing two types of “milk” at a rapid pace. If you are indeed a futa, then we are going to need extra help”

Sasha walks over and feels under your crotch. She finds….
113222.title: It's still there.

choices: You agree to go for a run
You decline saying you have more chores to do
12.content:
You decide to go groom Marie, you see the mare leaning on a fence looking out onto the horizon.

"Hey." You say

"Oh!" Marie says turning around "Sorry I didn't see you!"

"I presume you are Marie." You say humbly

"That I am." Marie says puffing up her chest proudly "You must be our new caretaker."

"Yes." You say "I was told you need grooming."

Marie blushes

"Well, yes." She says "I just had a run earlier today and now I'm covered in dust and burrs."

"No sweat." You say "I can help clean you up."

She gets down on all fours and you get out a big scrub brush and start to brush her from head to hoof, she nickers softly as you gently groom her.
Next you get out a hair brush and start getting the tangles and burrs out of her mane and tail, you put all the burrs in a big pile when you're done

Marie is grateful

"That was fun!" She nickers "Hey, do you want to go for a quick run?"
12.title: Go groom Marie

123.content:
"Sorry, Marie." you say. "Can't do that right now. I still need to milk Bess."

"Oh, right." she says. "It's been a while. Her back must be killing her."

"Yeah, so I should get to her now 'cause I might be stuck there for a while."

"Y'know," Marie says. "I can help you. I've got nothing to do, anyway."

"Thanks." you say gratefully. "I could use all the help I can get."

The two of you walk to the barn and see Bess standing in her stall, and she spots you.

"Why hello, Marie!" she says with a motherly tone. Then she turns to you. "You must be Derrick's nephew."

"That's me," you say.

"Well aren't you a handsome young fellow." she says. You chuckle in slight embarrassment. When Bess walks out of her stall, you see how big Bess's breasts were! You try not to stare, but Bess notices.

"Oh, I don't mind staring," she says. "I'm just glad that I'm finally getting milked after all this time. I was starting to worry my spine would implode."

So you get to work milking Bess, and thanks to the extra help from Marie, it only takes you roughly a half hour. Bess gets up and stretches in relief. "Ah! That feels so good."
123.title: You go milk Bess

choices: "We've hated each other since we were kids."
1231.content:
You hear a really loud noise coming from outside. It sounded like a shotgun. The suddenness of the gunshot shocks you out of your wits.

"What the heck was that!?" you ask.

"From the sound of things, it seems that she's here." Marie says.

"She?" you ask.

"Vicky." Bess says. You remember Sasha mentioning her this morning. "I should go see what's going on." you say. You rush outside and see Sasha out in the open with a shotgun in her hands.

"Come on out, you mangy fox!" she yells. "You can't hide forever." You notice the bushes behind Sasha start to rustle. "Behind you!" you yell to her. She immediately turns around, ready to fire at the bush, but a flash of reddish-orange zooms from the bushes right before Sasha pulls the trigger. You then see a fox on the roof of the farm house, just sitting on the edge swinging her feet. This must've been Vicky.

"No fair." she says coyly, looking at you. "This is between me and Sasha only."

"Don't you talk about fairness!" Sasha snaps. "You're the one trespassing on private property."

"Chill out, Sasha. I just wanted to see what the new caretaker looks like." Vicky says, looking at you again. "Now that I've seen him, I'll be on my way." and with that she jumps from the roof and runs into the woods.

"And don't come back!" Sasha yells. You had just witnessed one of the fiercest rivalries ever. You were curious to knwo Sasha and Vicky's history.

"Sasha, if you don't mind my asking," you say. "What's the story with you and Vicky?"

Sasha looks at you and says.
1231.title: Witnessing a Rivalry

12311.content:
"Well, we used to be friends." Sasha says as the two of you walk into the house and take a seat on the couch. "Do you mind telling me about it?" you ask.

"I guess it could help me calm down." she admits. "I've never told anyone else before." You prepare yourself for a long story.

"When Vicky and I were kids, we were the best of friends. We always would go to the park together, have sleepovers, typical childhood friend stuff. When we became teenagers, though, everything changed."

"How so?" you ask.

“Well, Vicky was an ‘early bloomer.’ She immediately got all the boys’ attention and eventually ignored me altogether. I though if I tried to reach out to her, she would listen, but instead she insulted me saying that she didn’t need me anymore.” The whole time, Sasha’s voice was progressively cracking to the point where she started crying.

You really feel sorry for her. You can’t imagine someone being so cruel to someone who was once their friend. “Honestly, sometimes I wonder where Vicky and I would be if we never stopped being friends.”

You feel hat you should do something. Should you confront Vicky about how she treated Sasha, or stay home and comfort her for now.
12311.title: Ex-Friends

choices: Sasha made a nice dinner for you.
123111.content:
At first you felt sad because Sasha was going through all of this emotional turmoil, but then your sadness is replaced by frustration, which builds and builds until-


"Where does Vicky live?" you ask Sasha.


"In a cave in the woods." she answers. "Why?"


"I'm gonna give her a piece of my mind!" you say.


"You don't have to do that." she says.


"I'm not doing it because I have to." you tell her. "I'm doing it because I want to." Sasha can’t help but smile at your nice, yet aggressive gesture, and she gives you directions to Vicky’s den. They were easy enough to understand.


Later that afternoon, you reach the cave that Vicky’s supposed to be in. “Vicky!” you call. “I need to talk to you!” You hear footsteps coming closer and closer. “Aw! You’ve come to confess your love to me even though Sasha hates me.” she says in a fake voice. “How noble!”


“Keep your weird fantasies to yourself next time.” you say. “Besides, why would I ever love someone as selfish and vain as you?” “Whatever do you mean?” Vicky asks. “I’ve never done anything to you.”


“Sasha told me about how the two of you used to be friends. Why would you end a friend ship with someone who’s been there for you for years?” you ask. “Simple. I grew up. What’s the point in having Sasha as a friend when all the boys flock to me like birds?” she says. “Besides, I was doing her a favor, too. If she kept hanging out with me, then she’d look worse in comparison to me.”


You couldn’t believe what you were hearing. Vicky was really a cold-hearted bitch. You don’t want to hear another word and you turn t leave, but Vicky says something. “You can stay here and fool around if you want.” “Bite me.” You say without turning around.

When you get home, you walk into the house and you see that
123111.title: A Piece of Your Mind

1231112.content:
When you enter the house, you see that Sasha was much more cheery than she was when you left her. “Well you seem to have gotten over the whole ‘Vicky’ thing.” you say. "Well, I've been thinking for a way to thank you for standing up to me." she says. "Oh, you don't need to do anything." you say. "Like I said, I did it because I wanted to."
